definition: to evaporate/(of cooking) to steam/torch made from hemp stalks or bamboo (old)/finely chopped firewood (old)
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: Other things being equal, the evapotranspiration rate decreases with increasing humidity.
sentences.chinese: 当其它条件相同时，蒸散率随湿度增大而减小。

sentences.english: Evapotranspiration is the sum of soil evaporation and vegetation transpiration.
sentences.chinese: 蒸散是土壤蒸发和植物蒸腾的总称。

sentences.english: And the exponential curve relationship between the evapotranspiration of turfgrass and canopy density above it was found.
sentences.chinese: 经回归分析，得出草坪蒸散量与郁闭度呈指数变化。

sentences.english: Turfgrass evapotranspiration (ET) is an important index for turfgrass irrigation.
sentences.chinese: 草坪蒸散量是指导草坪合理灌溉的重要指标。

sentences.english: CRAE models as an important method to estimate regional ET has found more and more recognition and application.
sentences.chinese: 互补相关模型也在估算区域蒸散上得到重视和应用。

definition: to de-absorb/to get a chemical out of solution
to adhere to a surface/to absorb/to draw in/(fig.) to attract/(chemistry) adsorption
